mapper.insert: insert into permission_delete (ID, URL, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.select: select ID, URL, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID from permission_delete
